summary: Network encompasses a multifaceted journey of growth, strategic planning, and self-awareness through various resources. It emphasizes the significance of personal strengths, resilience by embracing weaknesses, and strategic resource acquisition through networking. A featured course, Align the Misaligned, offers insights into conducting SWOT analyses and formulating strategic asks for startups to enhance their position and connectivity.
excerpt: Aligning the Misaligned involves a journey of growth and strategic planning. Discovering personal strengths builds confidence and direction. Embracing weaknesses fosters resilience and self-awareness.
